
                            <h1 class="item-name">
                                <span class="edit_interface"></span>
                                买年货用云闪付支付，每一笔都有优惠                            </h1>

                            <div class="recommend-tab z-clearfix item-preferential">
                                <span class="xilie">
                                    
                                    <span>2024-12-31 11:12:43</span>
                                    <span>6点赞</span>
                                    <span>2收藏</span>
                                    <span>0评论</span>
                                </span>

                                <!-- 风险提示 -->
                                
<!-- 直达链接-->

                            </div>

                            <p itemprop="description">年货采购季，云闪付助你精打细算。首先，在云闪付 APP 首页进入“热门推荐”，查看“年货节”专区，众多商品专属优惠齐聚。如知名坚果品牌，原价较高，使用云闪付支付享满减，能直接省下几十元，让你轻松囤货。</p><a href="https://post.smzdm.com/p/a5xq799l/pic_2/" target="_blank"><img alt="买年货用云闪付支付，每一笔都有优惠" src="https://qnam.smzdm.com/202412/31/677360a3da2972066.jpg_e1080.jpg" platform="fe" issmzmd="true" local_id="1735614741384" picture_id="19455802" width_attr="1242" height_attr="1659" image_tag="[]" other_data="%7B%7D" image_product_tag="%5B%5D"></a><p itemprop="description">在超市购物时，提前绑定常用银行卡，结账选云闪付付款码，每周都有随机立减机会，运气好能减十几元，柴米油盐酱醋茶等日用品采购成本直线下降。</p><a href="https://post.smzdm.com/p/a5xq799l/pic_3/" target="_blank"><img alt="买年货用云闪付支付，每一笔都有优惠" src="https://qnam.smzdm.com/202412/31/677360aee9ddc6962.jpg_e1080.jpg" platform="fe" issmzmd="true" local_id="1735614747132" picture_id="19455804" width_attr="1242" height_attr="2413" image_tag="[]" other_data="%7B%7D" image_product_tag="%5B%5D"></a><p itemprop="description">线上生鲜平台下单，云闪付联合平台发放优惠券，新鲜水果、肉类随心购，优惠后价格美丽。购买礼盒送亲友，部分商家针对云闪付用户有折扣，品质不变，价格更优。</p><a href="https://post.smzdm.com/p/a5xq799l/pic_4/" target="_blank"><img alt="买年货用云闪付支付，每一笔都有优惠" src="https://am.zdmimg.com/202412/31/677360a91f69b4896.jpg_e1080.jpg" platform="fe" issmzmd="true" local_id="1735614752178" picture_id="19455807" width_attr="1242" height_attr="2263" image_tag="[]" other_data="%7B%7D" image_product_tag="%5B%5D"></a><p itemprop="description">积分也别浪费，在云闪付积分商城兑换购物券，可用于购买零食、饮料等年货。还有云闪付的会员体系，积点兑换还款券、话费券，省上加省。年货采购用云闪付，把钱花在刀刃上，欢欢喜喜过大年！</p><a href="https://post.smzdm.com/p/a5xq799l/pic_5/" target="_blank"><img alt="买年货用云闪付支付，每一笔都有优惠" src="https://am.zdmimg.com/202412/31/677360b3d4c7b7486.jpg_e1080.jpg" platform="fe" issmzmd="true" local_id="1735614757019" picture_id="19455809" width_attr="1242" height_attr="1564" image_tag="[]" other_data="%7B%7D" image_product_tag="%5B%5D"></a>
